empty.companies: No companies found in the system.
empty.projects: No projects found for the selected company.
empty.buildings: No buildings found for the selected project.
empty.units: No units found for the selected building.

counts.projectsFound: Found {{count}} projects for the selected company
counts.buildingsFound: Found {{count}} buildings for the selected project
counts.unitsFound: Found {{count}} units for the selected building

floorplanSections.hintBuilding: The floorplan will be loaded to the canvas and building management
floorplanSections.hintUnit: The floorplan will be loaded to the canvas and unit management

replace.title: Replace {{typeLabel}}
replace.existingWarning: There is already a saved {{typeLabel}} for this company.
replace.layerWarning: The new floorplan you are loading may not match the existing layers that have been drawn on the previous floorplan.
replace.confirmQuestion: Do you want to continue and replace the existing floorplan?

fileDialog.title: Import DXF
fileDialog.hint: Click to select .dxf from your computer

mode.title: Select import method
mode.enhancedDesc: Automatic distribution to projects/buildings/floors with layer management.
mode.enhancedDisabled: No destinations available. Create projects first.
mode.legacyDesc: Direct import to current level (classic DXF Viewer behavior).
